name: Brawlz
description:
Brawlz is a simple local multiplayer shooter game where player 1 become a thrower and player 2 become a shooter. Play with your friends and see who will win.

Controls :

  • "W A S D" Key or Left Gamepad Stick To Move
  • "Space" Key or "A" Key On Gamepad To Join The Game (Max 2 Players)
  • "I J K L" or Right Stick Gamepad Stick To Aim
  • "Enter" Key or Right Shoulder Gamepad Stick (RB) To Attack

Assets
